info.title: BillingManagementClient
info.description: Billing client provides access to billing resources for Azure subscriptions.

get.description: Lists all billing accounts for a user which he has access to.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the invoiceSections and billingProfiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all billing accounts with create invoiceSection permission for a user.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the invoiceSections and billingProfiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the billing account by id.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the invoiceSections and billingProfiles.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: The latest available credit balance for a given billingAccountName and billingProfileName.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the Payment Methods by billing profile Id.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all billing profiles for a user which that user has access to.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the invoiceSections.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the billing profile by id.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the invoiceSections.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: The operation to update a billing profile.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the update billing profile operation.

202.description: Accepted. Billing profile update is in progress.

Location.description: GET this URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all departments for a user which he has access to.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: May be used to expand the enrollmentAccounts.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.description: The name of an invoice resource.

Retry-After.description: The amount of delay to use while the status of the operation is checked. The value is expressed in seconds.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: To get the progress of the operation, call GET operation on the URL in Azure-AsyncOperation header field.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists products by billingAccountName.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by product type. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by product type. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the transactions by billingAccountName for given start and end date.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by transaction kind. The filter supports 'eq', 'lt', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'or', or 'not'. Tag filter is a key value pair string where key and value is separated by a colon (:).

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

billingProfileId.description: Target Usage context for devTest subscriptions.

recipientEmailId.description: Email Id of recipient for transfer.

ProductDetails.description: Details of the product to be transferred.

productType.description: Type of the prouct to be transferred.

productId.description: Id of product to be transferred.

ProductType.description: Type of the product to be transferred.

EligibleProductType.description: Type of the products that can be transferred.

recipientEmailId.description: Email Id of recipient of transfer.

initiatorEmailId.description: Email Id of initiator of transfer.

canceledBy.description: Email Id who user canceled the transfer.

allowedProductType.description: Type of subscriptions that can be transferred.

recipientEmailId.description: Email Id of recipient of transfer.

initiatorEmailId.description: Email Id of initiator of transfer.

canceledBy.description: Email Id who user canceled the transfer.

value.description: The list of transfers received by caller.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

value.description: The list of transfers initiated by caller.

properties.description: Summary of update auto renew operation summary properties

UpdateAutoRenewOperationSummaryPropertie.description: update auto renew operation summary properties

endDate.description: The end date of this asset

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

BillingAccountProperties.description: The properties of the billing account.

company.description: The Company this billing account belongs to.

address.description: The address associated with billing account.

country.description: The country associated with billing account..

invoiceSections.description: The invoice sections associated to the billing account.

billingProfiles.description: The billing profiles associated to the billing account.

enrollmentDetails.description: The details about the associated legacy enrollment. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

departments.description: The departments associated to the enrollment.

enrollmentAccounts.description: The accounts associated to the enrollment.

policies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment.

EnrollmentPolicies.description: The attributes associated with legacy enrollment

reservedInstancesEnabled.description: The reserved instances flag for Enrollment

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

enrollmentAccounts.description: Associated enrollment accounts. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

department.description: Associated department. By default this is not populated, unless it's specified in $expand.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

BillingProfileProperties.description: The properties of the billing profile.

invoiceEmailOptIn.description: If the billing profile is opted in to receive invoices via email.

currency.description: The currency associated with the billing profile.

invoiceSections.description: The invoice sections associated to the billing profile.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

billingProfiles.description: The billing profiles associated to the billing account.

OperationStatus.description: status of the Billing POST/PUT operation.

statusDetail.description: Status Detail of the pending operation

DownloadUrl.description: A secure URL that can be used to download a an entity until the URL expires.

expiryTime.description: The time in UTC at which this download URL will expire.

url.description: The URL to the PDF file.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

invoiceDate.description: The date when invoice was created.

invoicePeriodStartDate.description: The start date of the billing period.

invoicePeriodEndDate.description: The end date of the billing period.

billingProfile.description: The profile id which invoice belongs to.

billingProfileName.description: The profile name which invoice belongs to.

purchaseOrderNumber.description: The purchase identifier for the invoice.

documentUrls.description: List of document urls available to download including invoice and tax documents.

DownloadProperties.description: The properties of the invoice download.

ProductsListResult.description: Result of listing products summary. It contains a list of available products summaries in reverse chronological order by purchase date.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

ProductSummaryProperties.description: The properties of the product summary.

displayName.description: The display name of the product.

lastChargeDate.description: The date of the last charge.

invoiceSectionId.description: Invoice section id to which this product belongs.

invoiceSectionName.description: Invoice section name to which this product belongs.

billingProfileId.description: Billing Profile id to which this product belongs.

billingProfileName.description: Billing Profile name to which this product belongs.

BillingSubscriptionsListResult.description: Result of listing billing subscriptions summary.

value.description: The list of billing subscriptions summary.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

billingProfileId.description: Billing Profile id to which this product belongs.

billingProfileName.description: Billing Profile name to which this product belongs.

TransactionsListResult.description: Result of listing reservation transactions summary.

value.description: The list of reservation transactions summary.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

TransactionsSummaryProperties.description: The properties of the reservation transaction summary.

kind.description: The kind of transaction. Choices are all and reservation.

invoice.description: Invoice number or 'pending' if not invoiced.

transactionAmount.description: Last charge associated with the purchase.

invoiceSectionId.description: Invoice section id to which this product belongs.

invoiceSectionName.description: Invoice section name to which this product belongs.

billingProfileId.description: Billing Profile id to which this product belongs.

billingProfileName.description: Billing Profile name to which this product belongs.

AvailableBalance.description: Latest available balance on Monetary Credit PI.

currency.description: The currency for the amount value.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

PaymentMethodProperties.description: The properties of the payment method.

currency.description: The currency associated with the payment method.

UpdateAutoRenewRequest.description: Request parameters to update auto renew for support product.

autoRenew.description: Request parameters to update auto renew policy a product.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result listing billing operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of billing operations supported by the Microsoft.Billing resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

BillingRoleAssignmentPayload.description: The payload use to update role assignment on a scope

principalId.description: The user's principal id that the role gets assigned to

BillingRoleAssignmentListResult.description: Result of get list of role assignments

properties.description: The role assignment the caller has

BillingRoleAssignmentProperties.description: The properties of the a role assignment.

createdOn.description: the date the role assignment is created

name.description: the name of the role assignment

principalId.description: The user's principal id that the role gets assigned to

scope.description: The scope the role get assigned to

BillingRoleDefinition.description: Result of get role definition for a role.

properties.description: The role definition for a role.

BillingRoleDefinitionProperties.description: The properties of the a role definition.

BillingPermissionsListResult.description: Result of list billingPermissions a caller has on a billing account.

value.description: The list OF billingPermissions a caller has on a billing account.

BillingPermissions.description: The set of allowed action and not allowed actions a caller has on a billing account

actions.description: The set of actions that the caller is allowed to do

notActions.description: The set of actions the caller is not allowed to do

Action.description: the action the caller allowed to do

NotAction.description: the action the caller doesn't allowed to do

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2018-11-01-preview.
